short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It will Save User ID/Name and Password Locally inside your browser for Convenient Access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension helps you store and manage your user credentials efficiently. We try to Simplify User Credentials Manage in chrome browser. 


Key Features:

Local Storage: Store your user names/IDs and passwords securely on your PC within the Chrome browser, specifically for the websites you choose.
Privacy First: Your data remains local to your machine. We do not share, store, or transmit your credentials outside of your PC.
Easy Management: Add, view, and delete credentials effortlessly. A convenient delete button is available next to each credential for easy removal.
Secure Usage: Designed for personal use only. Ensure your credentials are deleted before sharing your PC or laptop.


How It Works:
The extension autofill's your saved credentials on specified websites, similar to the built-in "remember me" feature in Chrome, making login processes quicker and more convenient. It's have some websites listed for you if you click one; that will re-direct to that particular url/webpage links for your smooth transactions. Now you don't need to remember those url/webpage links. 

    

Important Notice:
For security reasons, we recommend using this extension only on your personal devices. Avoid using it on public or shared computers to protect your sensitive information.
